FuncDef:
The flow-statistic frequency command specifies the frequency to collect traffic statistics on a specific board.
By default, the frequency of collecting online user traffic statistics on the MPUB4 and MPUB5 is slow, and the frequency of collecting online user traffic statistics on non-B4 MPUs and non-B5 MPUs is default.
CLIs: flow-statistic frequency { fast | normal | slow | default }

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the fast traffic statistics collection frequency.
-

Sets the normal traffic statistics collection frequency.
-

Sets the slow traffic statistics collection frequency.
-

Sets the default traffic statistics collection frequency.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The flow-statistic frequency normal command is used when the frequency to collect traffic statistics needs to be adjusted.
Configuration Impact
If the flow-statistic frequency fast command is configured on a board, traffic statistics about a maximum of 320 online users are collected on this board each second.
If the flow-statistic frequency normal command is configured on a board, traffic statistics about a maximum of 160 online users are collected on this board each second.
If the flow-statistic frequency slow command is configured on a board, traffic statistics about a maximum of 80 online users are collected on this board each second.
If the flow-statistic frequency default command is configured on a slot, traffic statistics about a maximum of 320 online users are collected on this slot each second.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
If the flow-statistic frequency default command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
